courseDetails.shortDescription: Executive Certificate: CX / Customer Experience, Principles and Foundations of Digital Business and Transformation
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to Program: Digital Transformation & Customer Experience Management by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 215 countries and has been chosen by more than 620 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses on to wide range of students from undergraduate level to business students of professional and executives courses. Currently, at EIMT in Zurich, Switzerland, she lectures for doctoral students, offering advanced instruction in research design and methodologies, and in MTF Institute Ms. Amoroso is leading Product Development academical domain.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.


Customer experience (CX) is the overall impression customers have of your brand throughout their interactions with your business. It encompasses everything from the initial marketing message to the post-purchase support they receive. Think of it as the customer journey, and CX is all the touchpoints along the way that shape their perception.


Key Areas of CX

  • Customer touchpoints: Every interaction a customer has with your brand, like websites, social media, advertising, in-store experience, and customer service.

  • Customer journey: Mapping out the steps a customer takes to interact with your brand, from awareness to purchase and beyond.

  • Customer satisfaction: How happy customers are with your product or service.

  • Customer loyalty: How likely customers are to return and recommend your brand to others.


CX Frameworks

Frameworks provide a structured approach to improving CX. Here are two common ones:

  • Customer Experience Journey Map: A visual representation of the customer journey, identifying touchpoints and opportunities for improvement.

  • Five Service Dimensions: A framework that focuses on five key aspects of service quality: reliability, responsiveness, assurance, empathy, and tangibles.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Companies:

  1. Improved Customer Satisfaction and Loyalty: CXM focuses on understanding and meeting customer needs, leading to increased satisfaction and a higher likelihood of repeat business.

  2. Enhanced Brand Reputation: Positive customer experiences contribute to a strong brand reputation, attracting new customers and retaining existing ones.

  3. Increased Revenue and Profitability: Satisfied customers are more likely to spend more, refer others, and remain loyal, all of which contribute to revenue growth.

  4. Competitive Advantage: In today's crowded marketplace, exceptional customer experience can be a key differentiator, setting a company apart from its competitors.

  5. Reduced Costs: Resolving customer issues proactively and efficiently can reduce the cost of customer service and support.


Why Learning CXM is Important for Building a Career as a Manager:

  1. In-demand Skill: CXM is a highly sought-after skill in today's business world, as companies increasingly recognize its importance.

  2. Career Advancement: Expertise in CXM can open doors to various managerial roles, such as Customer Experience Manager, Customer Success Manager, or Marketing Manager.

  3. Problem-solving Skills: CXM involves identifying and addressing customer pain points, which enhances problem-solving and analytical skills.

  4. Leadership Development: Managing customer experience initiatives requires strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills.

  5. Cross-functional Collaboration: CXM often involves working with multiple departments, providing managers with exposure to different areas of the business.


Overall, learning CXM is crucial for companies looking to thrive in the modern business landscape. It's also a valuable investment for managers aiming to build a successful career in various industries.


Importance of Education in Digital Transformation for Companies and Managers:

In the  business environment, digital transformation has emerged as a key driver of competitive advantage and long-term success. Embracing digital technologies is no longer an option but a necessity for companies to remain relevant and thrive. However, implementing digital transformation initiatives requires more than just adopting new tools; it demands a comprehensive understanding of digital trends, customer behavior, data analytics, and organizational change management. This education helps companies and managers:


Strategic Adaptation: Digital transformation education empowers organizations to align their strategies with the opportunities and challenges presented by the digital age. It helps leaders identify potential areas for disruption and develop agile responses to stay ahead of the competition.


Enhanced Customer Experience: Understanding digital transformation enables businesses to design and deliver exceptional customer experiences, which are crucial for customer retention and loyalty in today's customer-centric market.


Data-Driven Decision Making: The course equips managers with skills in data analysis and interpretation, enabling them to make data-driven decisions that lead to improved business outcomes.


Innovation and Creativity: Participants will learn about emerging technologies and innovation processes, fostering a culture of creativity within their organizations and driving continuous improvement.


Organizational Resilience: With digital transformation education, managers can build resilient organizations capable of adapting to disruptions and thriving in times of uncertainty.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in business

Operations management (OM) is the administration of business practices to create the highest level of efficiency possible within an organization. It is concerned with converting materials and labor into goods and services as efficiently as possible to maximize the profit of an organization. OM covers all aspects of a business, from the design and management of products, services, and processes, to the management of supply chains and logistics.


Importance of Operations Management Skills for Career and Business:

Developing skills in operations management can significantly benefit your career and entrepreneurial endeavors in the following ways:

Career:

  • Enhanced Employability: Operations management skills are highly sought after in various industries, including manufacturing, healthcare, technology, retail, and service sectors. Expertise in OM can open up a wide range of career opportunities, such as operations manager, supply chain analyst, production planner, quality manager, project manager, and more.

  • Increased Earning Potential: Professionals with strong operations management skills often command higher salaries due to their ability to optimize processes, reduce costs, improve efficiency, and drive overall business success.

  • Problem-Solving and Decision-Making Abilities: Operations management equips you with the skills to analyze complex problems, identify bottlenecks, and make data-driven decisions that lead to improved operational performance. These skills are valuable assets for any career path.

courseDetails.title: Excel Accounting 6–Adjusting Entries & Financial Statements
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to enter adjusting entries into an Excel worksheet from a certified public accountant (CPA)
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course will focus on period-end adjusting entries, entries needed to report financial statements accurately on an accrual basis.

Learners will know how to navigate Microsoft Excel and use a well-designed accounting worksheet, complete with a general journal, trial balance, general ledger, subsidiary ledgers for accounts receivable, accounts payable, & inventory, financial statements, and much more.

Excel is an excellent tool to learn accounting because it is much more transparent than a database program, like accounting software. QuickBooks is a typical example of accounting software.

For most new steps in our accounting practice problem, you will have access to a downloadable Excel Workbook containing at least two tabs, one with the answer, the new tasks completed, the other starting where the prior presentation left off.

We will discuss adjusting entries, how to format an adjusting entry worksheet, and how the day-to-day accounting process and the period-end adjusting entries fit together.

Next, we will enter adjusting entries and reversing entries for accrued interest, the interest we have incurred but have not yet paid.

Then we will enter adjusting entries and reversing entries related to an invoice or sales transaction originally entered after the cutoff date, month-end, but for which the work was done before the cutoff date.

After that, we will enter adjusting entries for prepaid insurance, which leads to the next adjusting entry for depreciation.

Next, we will enter adjusting entries and reversing entries related to unearned revenue. The unearned revenue entry is different from many book problems but a standard method when using accounting software.

Then we will enter a transaction to break out the short-term and long-term portion of loans according to their related amortization tables.

Finally, we will take the adjusted trial balance, a trial balance constructed after entering the adjusting entries, and create financial statements.
targetAudiences: Accountants and business professionals
Students practicing accounting or business

courseDetails.title: Excel Accounting 1–Transactions for Common Data Input Forms
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn how to build an accounting system using Excel and how to enter common transactions from a CPA
courseDetails.longDescription:
In this course we will build an accounting system starting with a blank Excel worksheet, creating a general journal, a general ledger, a trial balance, subledgers, and financial statements.

For each new step in the process, you will have access to a downloadable Excel Workbook, containing at least two tabs, one with the answer, the new steps having been completed, the other starting out where the prior presentation left off.

Once we have created our accounting system worksheet, we will use it to record common transactions, entering the journal entries into the general journal, posting to the general ledger, creating the trial balance, adjusting the subsidiary ledgers, and constructing the financial statements.

As we enter each transaction, we will consider the data input often used in accounting software like QuickBooks. Accounting software will use data input forms like bills, invoices, credit memos, checks, sales receipts, and more, to simplify the data input process, allowing users with little accounting experience to learn data input.

Accountants are generally more valuable when they understand both the accounting theory, the impact on financial statements of each transaction, as well as how an accounting database program like QuickBooks works, including the data input forms used to enter normal financial transactions.

Because spreadsheets are so transparent, they are the perfect tool to gain and understanding of both, accounting theory and accounting software.

Conversely, building an accounting system in Excel is a great way, one of the best ways, to improve your Excel skills.
targetAudiences: Accounting professionals
Anyone who wants to learn Excel
Students
Business professionals

courseDetails.title: Personal Finance #10-Bonds & Fixed-Income Investments
courseDetails.shortDescription: Demystifying Bonds: Your Path to Successful Fixed-Income Investing
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to: Mastering Bonds: A Comprehensive Guide to Fixed-Income Investments, where we embark on an enriching journey through the intricate landscape of bond investments. This course is designed to empower learners of all levels, from novices seeking foundational knowledge to experienced investors aiming to sharpen their skills and strategies in the world of fixed-income securities.

Our comprehensive exploration of bond investments encompasses not only the fundamentals but also advanced techniques, ensuring that you gain a profound understanding and the confidence to navigate this dynamic market effectively.

Investing Overview: Begin your journey with a solid grounding in investing principles. Understand the crucial role bonds play in diversifying your investment portfolio and managing risk.

Time Horizons and Investing Goals: Delve deeper into the concept of aligning your investment goals with your unique time horizon. Explore how your financial objectives evolve over time and tailor your bond investments accordingly.

Investment Strategy: Craft a resilient investment strategy that aligns with your financial goals and risk tolerance. Learn to balance the pursuit of returns with the preservation of capital through strategic bond selection.

Personal Finance Checkup: Conduct a comprehensive personal finance assessment to ensure your readiness for bond investing. Evaluate your financial health, identify areas of strength, and address potential weaknesses before diving into the bond market.

Interest Rate Risk: Navigate the complexities of interest rate risk, a pivotal factor influencing bond prices. Gain practical strategies to mitigate risk and seize opportunities as interest rates fluctuate.

Market Risk: Explore market risk in-depth and harness techniques to manage it effectively. Understand the interconnectedness of macroeconomic factors and bond markets, enabling you to make informed decisions in a dynamic environment.

Common Stock: Compare and contrast bonds with common stocks. Analyze their unique characteristics, risk profiles, and roles within a diversified investment portfolio.

Mutual Fund: Discover the world of bond mutual funds and their role in simplifying bond investments. Understand how mutual funds pool resources to invest in a diversified portfolio of bonds.

Liquidity Risk: Examine liquidity risk and its implications for bond investors. Learn to assess and manage liquidity risk factors, ensuring you can access your invested capital when needed.

Asset Allocation: Master the art of asset allocation, a critical aspect of building a well-balanced bond portfolio. Explore different asset allocation models to optimize returns while controlling risk.

Asset Allocation Strategies: Deepen your knowledge of asset allocation with advanced strategies. Explore tactical approaches such as strategic asset allocation and dynamic asset allocation to adapt to changing market conditions.

Diversification: Uncover the power of diversification in bond investing. Understand how spreading investments across various bond types, sectors, and geographies can enhance risk-adjusted returns.

Government Bond: Take an in-depth look at government bonds, often considered the bedrock of fixed-income investing. Understand the nuances of various government bond types, including Treasury bonds and municipal bonds.

Municipal Bonds: Explore municipal bonds in detail, including their role in financing local government projects. Dive into the intricacies of general obligation bonds and revenue bonds.

General Obligation (GO) Bond: Analyze the ins and outs of general obligation (GO) bonds, backed by the full faith and credit of municipalities. Learn how to evaluate the creditworthiness of issuing municipalities.

Treasury Bills (T-Bills): Discover the world of Treasury bills (T-Bills), short-term government securities. Learn how T-Bills are issued, traded, and their role in managing liquidity.

Treasury Note: Explore Treasury notes and their relevance to investors seeking steady income. Understand how Treasury notes with varying maturities can align with your investment objectives.

Treasury Inflation-Protected Securities (TIPS): Delve into Treasury Inflation-Protected Securities (TIPS), designed to shield investors from the erosive effects of inflation. Explore how TIPS provide a reliable hedge against rising consumer prices.

Revenue Bond: Gain a comprehensive understanding of revenue bonds and their link to specific revenue-generating projects. Learn how revenue bonds differ from general obligation bonds and assess the associated risks.

Tax-Equivalent Yield: Calculate tax-equivalent yields to make informed investment decisions. Explore how taxes impact bond returns and discover strategies for comparing taxable and tax-free bond yields.

Fixed-Income Security: Explore fixed-income securities as the cornerstone of consistent income generation in your portfolio. Examine various fixed-income instruments, including bonds, bond funds, and certificates of deposit (CDs).

Interest Rates, Inflation, and Bonds: Decode the intricate interplay between interest rates, inflation, and bonds. Understand how shifts in these economic factors influence bond prices and yields.

Corporate Bond: Analyze corporate bonds from different perspectives, including credit quality, industry sectors, and credit ratings. Learn how to assess corporate bond risks and rewards.

Convertible Bond: Uncover the unique features of convertible bonds, which offer the potential for capital appreciation while providing downside protection. Explore scenarios in which convertible bonds can enhance your portfolio.

High-Yield Bond: Explore high-yield bonds, also known as junk bonds, and their potential for higher returns. Assess the associated credit risks and strategies for incorporating high-yield bonds into your portfolio.

Callable Bond: Examine callable bonds and their impact on bond investors. Understand the dynamics of callable bond pricing and strategies to navigate callable bond markets.

Bond Market vs. Stock Market: Draw a comprehensive comparison between the bond market and the stock market. Understand the unique characteristics, risks, and benefits of investing in bonds versus stocks.

Money Market vs. Short-Term Bonds: Differentiate between money market instruments and short-term bonds. Explore the scenarios in which each option is most suitable for your cash management and investment goals.

Zero-Coupon Bond vs Regular Bond: Learn about zero-coupon bonds and their role in long-term financial planning. Compare them to traditional coupon-bearing bonds and understand their potential advantages.

Bond Market Pricing: Gain insights into the intricacies of bond market pricing and valuation. Explore how bond prices are determined in the secondary market, including the impact of interest rates and credit quality.

Mortgage-Backed Security (MBS): Explore the world of mortgage-backed securities (MBS) and their significance in the real estate market. Understand the structure of MBS and the risks associated with these investments.

Asset-Backed Security (ABS): Delve into asset-backed securities (ABS) and their connection to diverse asset classes, from auto loans to credit card receivables. Learn about the structuring of ABS and how they function in financial markets.

Collateralized Debt Obligation (CDO): Gain a deep understanding of collateralized debt obligations (CDOs) and their structured nature. Explore how CDOs are created, rated, and traded in the financial markets.

Sinking Fund: Learn about sinking funds and their role in ensuring timely bond repayments. Understand how sinking funds provide an added layer of security for bondholders and assess their benefits.

Join us on this illuminating journey through the captivating realm of bond investments. Whether you aspire to secure your financial future, generate a steady stream of income, or diversify your investment portfolio, this course equips you with the knowledge, strategies, and confidence to excel in the bond market. Enroll today and embark on your path to mastering bonds.
targetAudiences: Beginners: If you're new to the world of investments and want to start with a relatively conservative option, this course will provide you with the foundational knowledge needed to get started with bond investments.

Investors Seeking Diversification: If you're an existing investor looking to diversify your portfolio beyond stocks or other assets, bonds can be an excellent addition. This course will help you understand how bonds work and their role in diversification.
Financial Enthusiasts: If you have a general interest in finance and want to expand your knowledge, learning about bonds and the fixed-income market is a valuable addition to your financial literacy.

Retirement Planners: For individuals planning for retirement, bonds can be an essential component of a balanced portfolio. Understanding the different types of bonds and their risks is crucial for retirement planning.

Financial Advisors: Financial advisors and professionals can benefit from this course by gaining a deeper understanding of bond investments, allowing them to better assist clients in constructing diversified portfolios.
Anyone Interested in Bonds: Whether you're considering investing in bonds, already hold some bonds, or are simply curious about how bonds work, this course will provide you with valuable insights.

courseDetails.title: Financial Accounting–Inventory & Merchandising Transactions
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Inventory Accounting: From Merchandising Transactions to Cost Flow Assumptions
courseDetails.longDescription:
Dive deep into the world of inventory accounting with this comprehensive course focused on merchandising transactions and cost flow assumptions. This course is perfect for anyone seeking a thorough understanding of how to handle inventory costs, cost flows, and various related transactions.

Starting with the essentials, we will examine the purchase and sale of inventory, including important associated topics like sales discounts, purchase discounts, sales return, and allowances. You will learn how to account for shrinkage and how to perform a cost of goods sold (COGS) calculation, both crucial aspects of inventory management.

We will then broaden your knowledge of different inventory systems. By comparing and contrasting perpetual and periodic inventory systems, you will gain insights into the benefits and drawbacks of each. Understanding when to use which system in practice is a key skill this course aims to instill.

Delving deeper, we'll explore inventory costs and cost flows. You'll discover what's included in the inventory cost and how to account for various inventory-associated costs, such as freight, insurance, and discounts. This knowledge will equip you to accurately represent inventory value in financial reporting.

A critical part of this course is dedicated to inventory flow assumptions. Here, we study specific identification, first in first out (FIFO), last in first out (LIFO), and weighted average methods. These methods will be examined in the context of both perpetual and periodic inventory systems, giving you a comprehensive understanding of their application.

The course employs a variety of engaging materials to aid learning:

  1. Downloadable PDF Files - These serve as handy offline references.

  2. Excel Practice Files - Preformatted files for honing your Excel skills and practicing adjustments.

  3. Multiple Choice Practice Questions - Perfect for enhancing test-taking abilities and understanding course material.

  4. Short Calculation Practice Questions - These focus on reducing complex problems to simpler calculations.

  5. Discussion Questions - Offering the chance to explore topics with your instructor and fellow students.

Our instructor, a certified public accountant (CPA) and chartered global management accountant (CGMA) with a master's in taxation, brings a wealth of practical and teaching experience. Having dealt with a multitude of technical accounting issues and taught numerous accounting classes, he knows how to help students learn best. His experience in curriculum development ensures the course is logically structured, making complex topics and software accessible.

By the end of this course, you'll have a robust understanding of merchandising transactions, inventory tracking methods, inventory costs, and much more. Our comprehensive problems provide practical application, simulating real-world accounting scenarios. This course is an invaluable resource for anyone keen to master inventory accounting.
targetAudiences: Business and accounting students seeking to deepen their understanding of inventory management and merchandising transactions, whether they are beginners or in advanced stages of their studies.
Professionals in the fields of accounting, finance, or business management who deal with inventory and merchandising transactions as part of their work.
Entrepreneurs and small business owners who handle their own accounting and inventory management, and want to ensure they are doing it correctly and efficiently.
Anyone preparing for a job that involves managing inventory or dealing with merchandising transactions, and wants to bring a solid foundation of knowledge to their role.
Individuals interested in understanding more about the financial operations of a business, particularly those related to the buying and selling of inventory.

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT & IA : Formation complète ChatGPT, Dall-e
courseDetails.shortDescription: Maîtrisez l'IA : ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini | guide complet sur l’intelligence artificielle et les IA génératives
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formation complète ChatGPT & IA génératives :


Etes-vous prêt à démarrer chaque journée avec un allié, un assistant personnel extrêmement doué, prêt à accomplir vos tâches avec une précision et une rapidité inégalée. Une IA capable de rédiger vos mails, articles ou rapports, de créer des images inspirantes, d'analyser des données complexes, de coder des solutions sur mesure et de résoudre une multitude de problèmes, vous permettant ainsi de vous concentrer sur ce qui compte vraiment.


Pour tirer tous ces bénéfices de l’IA encore faut-il la maîtriser. Beaucoup de personnes s’enthousiasment, réalisent 2 ou 3 prompts et finissent par abandonner le sujet sans découvrir le vrai potentiel de l’intelligence artificielle. Derrière ce comportement se cache souvent une méconnaissance des techniques, méthodes, paramétrages qui permettent d’obtenir les meilleurs résultats avec l’intelligence artificielle.


Le but de cette formation c’est donc de vous donner toutes les clés pour communiquer efficacement avec l’IA, la paramétrer au mieux et l’exploiter pleinement.


Et pour y parvenir, j’ai conçu un parcours concis et dynamique qui vous permettra de développer les connaissances et compétences essentielles à l’utilisation optimisée de l’IA.

Au cours de cette formation, nous verrons ensemble :

- Comment formuler des requêtes claires à l’IA pour obtenir les meilleures réponses possibles

- Comment configurer ChatGPT pour qu'il devienne votre professeur, co-fondateur ou analyste de confiance.

- Comment générer de multiples idées et devenir meilleur dans votre travail, plus productif, plus rapide, plus pertinent et efficace.

- Comment profiter pleinement de la multimodalité de ChatGPT pour lui écrire, lui parler, l’écouter, lui transmettre des images et lui demander de les interpréter.

- Comment pousser Dall-e ou Copilot à générer les meilleures images possibles.

- Comment trouver des alternatives intéressantes à la version payante de ChatGPT.

- On va également explorer d’autres IA comme Copilot, Claude ou Gemini.

- On verra comment adapter ChatGPT à vos préférences et besoins spécifiques pour des réponses sur mesure.

- On va voir comment booster ChatGPT grâce aux GPTs : comment utiliser ces applications et même comment les créer sans être développeur.

- On va aussi explorer des sujets un peu plus techniques en fin de formation comme la gestion des API, le playground, l’intégration de ChatGPT sur d’autres logiciels comme Excel ou Google sheets par exemple.

- Et surtout on verra que tout ça est accessible à tous, même aux débutants.


Dans cette formation, vous trouverez :

  • Des démonstrations concrètes.

  • Des fiches techniques et guides pratiques téléchargeables.

  • Et surtout un contenu régulièrement mis à jour


En bref, vous vous apprêtez à suivre un cours clair, accessible et engageant. Assez détaillé pour couvrir les notions essentielles sans traîner en longueur. Peu importe votre niveau de départ que vous soyez débutant ou à la recherche de techniques avancées, c’est la seule formation dont vous aurez besoin pour maîtriser ChatGPT.


Qui suis-je ?

Je m’appelle Yassine Rochd, je suis le fondateur d’un organisme de formation qui a aidé des milliers d’apprenants à atteindre leurs objectifs professionnels.

Je suis également passionné par la technologie. Après un master en finance et des expériences en conseil et en fonds d’investissement, j'ai suivi une formation en développement web et passé des centaines d’heures à découvrir et utiliser des IA.

Aujourd’hui, je souhaite vous transmettre le plus clairement possible ce que j’ai appris ces dernières années.


Certification et garantie :

- En terminant cette formation, vous recevrez une certification que vous pourrez même partager sur LinkedIn.

- Cette formation est également sans risque puisque vous bénéficiez d’une garantie « satisfait ou remboursé » de 30 jours.

- Vous bénéficiez d’un accès à vie à la formation, aux ressources téléchargeables et aux futures mises à jour


Vous êtes à un clic de maîtriser une technologie extrêmement utile qui vous rendra plus efficace, plus productif, et tout simplement incontournable.



Détail des différentes sections de ce cours sur ChatGPT et l'IA :


I. Prise en main rapide de ChatGPT

Découvrez comment maîtriser rapidement ChatGPT en seulement quelques vidéos. Plongez dans l'interface intuitive de ChatGPT et apprenez à créer vos premiers prompts pour exploiter pleinement la puissance de l'IA. Que ce soit pour générer des tableaux, brainstormer, générer des idées, traduire et corriger des textes, ou encore rédiger des contenus variés, vous irez plus vite et serez plus performant avec l’IA. Découvrez comment ChatGPT peut vous assister dans votre recherche d'emploi et s'adapter à vos besoins professionnels pour accroître votre efficacité. Vous verrez que ChatGPT est capable de créer une multitude de contenus, allant des mails et lettres aux articles et posts pour les réseaux sociaux, sans oublier la rédaction de code informatique.


II. Les bases du prompt engineering

Apprenez pourquoi le prompt engineering est essentiel et comment il peut transformer ChatGPT en véritable expert. Comprenez l'importance du contexte et des objectifs pour structurer vos interactions, et découvrez comment ajuster le format et la température pour optimiser vos prompts et varier le niveau de créativité du modèle. Personnalisez vos interactions en maîtrisant le ton et le style, et bénéficiez de 5 conseils pratiques pour obtenir des réponses encore plus pertinentes de ChatGPT.

III. techniques avancées de prompt engineering

Dans cette section, on verra comment créer des prompts qui génèrent eux-mêmes d'autres prompts. On étudiera la méthode du reverse engineering, les fonctionnalités de recherche web, d’interprétation d’images et encore plein d’autres techniques avancées.


IV. Dall-e

On enchainera sur la génération d’images avec Dall-e. Vous verrez comment passer d’un résultat très moyen à des œuvres esthétiques et inspirantes, comment modifier simplement et rapidement des portions d'images et optimiser vos résultats. On étudiera également des techniques avancées qui vous permettront par exemple de créer une continuité dans la génération d’un personnage de fiction ou de bande dessinée, pour des résultats encore plus impressionnants.


V. Les solutions aux limites de ChatGPT et de l’IA

ChatGPT et les autres modèles d’intelligence artificielle présentent des limites et des faiblesses. On verra dans cette section quelles sont-elles et comment les surmonter.


VI. Fonctionnalités intéressantes sur ChatGPT

Apprenez à paramétrer les fonctionnalités de partage de vos conversations pour une utilisation collaborative de ChatGPT. Exploitez au mieux l’application mobile Chat GPT, en explorant toutes les options qu'elle offre. Enfin, découvrez les méthodes pour créer un contenu unique avec l’IA en évitant toute forme de plagiat ou contenu dupliqué.


VII. Copilot et Bing

Copilot propose plusieurs alternatives intéressantes à des fonctionnalités payantes et avancées de ChatGPT. On verra comment profiter du partenariat entre Microsoft et OpenAI pour accéder à des fonctionnalités avancées d’intelligence artificielle intégrées au moteur de recherche Bing.


VIII. Gemini, Claude, Mistral et les autres

Dans la continuité de la section précédente, on étudiera d’autres IA comme Gemini de Google ou Claude d’Anthropique. On verra leur force, leur faiblesse et on étudiera plusieurs cas d’utilisation pour savoir dans quel cas les préférer à ChatGPT.


IX. Custom Instructions ChatGPT

Adaptez ChatGPT à vos besoins et à vos attentes. Apprenez à personnaliser vos interactions en configurant vos custom instructions. Découvrez également les points de vigilance à considérer pour une utilisation optimale.


X. Les GPTs

Découvrez le fonctionnement des GPTs, ces mini applications hyperspécialisées qui peuvent parfois dépasser ChatGPT. Apprenez à créer votre propre GPT étape par étape. Maîtrisez les appels d’API pour maximiser les capacités de ChatGPT et découvrez même en fin de section comment monétiser vos GPTs et, plus largement, comment gagner de l'argent grâce à ChatGPT.


XI. Gestion d’API & Playground

Explorez le playground de ChatGPT et découvrez les nouvelles fonctionnalités qu'il offre. Apprenez à appeler l'API de ChatGPT avec des niveaux de difficulté croissants. Vous pourrez ainsi utiliser ChatGPT en dehors de l'interface, créer un chatbot sur un autre site ou même intégrer ChatGPT à d'autres logiciels comme Google Sheets ou Excel, par exemple.
targetAudiences: Toute personne souhaitant maîtriser l'IA et ChatGPT. Cette formation est tout niveau.

courseDetails.title: Forex Trading Guide: Master Forex Trading Skills
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock the Secrets of Successful Forex Trading: Master Strategies, Risk Management, and Technical Analysis
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Mastering Forex Trading: From Basics to Advanced Strategies," your comprehensive guide to navigating the exciting and dynamic world of currency trading! Whether you're a complete beginner eager to explore the forex market or an intermediate trader looking to refine your skills and strategies, this course is designed to equip you with the knowledge and tools necessary for success in forex trading.


In this course, you'll embark on a journey to understand the fundamental principles of forex trading. We start with the essentials, introducing key terminology, market structure, and the various types of currency pairs. You'll learn how to differentiate between major, minor, and exotic pairs and grasp the mechanics behind forex trading.


One of the cornerstones of this course is mastering technical analysis. You'll discover how to analyze price movements using essential tools and indicators such as moving averages, Bollinger Bands, and the Relative Strength Index (RSI). We’ll delve into the intricacies of reading forex charts, including line, bar, and candlestick charts, empowering you to make informed trading decisions based on market trends and patterns.


We understand that forex trading is not just about numbers; it’s also about understanding the market environment. This course will introduce you to fundamental analysis, where you'll learn how economic indicators, such as GDP, inflation rates, and employment figures, impact currency values. You'll also explore how geopolitical events and central bank policies shape market sentiment, allowing you to anticipate potential price movements effectively.


But that's not all! This course goes beyond theory; you'll learn proven trading strategies tailored for different trading styles. Whether you prefer the fast-paced action of scalping, the strategic approach of day trading, or the long-term vision of swing and position trading, we have you covered. Each strategy is presented with clear, actionable steps and real-world examples, ensuring you can implement them in your trading.


Risk management is crucial in forex trading, and this course emphasizes techniques to help protect your capital. You'll learn how to calculate position sizes, set stop-loss and take-profit orders, and utilize leverage wisely. Our approach ensures that you can navigate the markets with confidence, minimizing risks while maximizing potential rewards.


Furthermore, we delve into the psychological aspects of trading, which are often overlooked yet vital for success. You'll gain valuable insights into managing emotions, maintaining discipline, and cultivating the patience required for effective trading. Understanding trading psychology will help you avoid common pitfalls, enabling you to make rational decisions even in the face of market volatility.


By the end of this course, you will not only have a solid understanding of forex trading but also the confidence to implement your own trading strategies. You'll have the skills necessary to analyze the market, adapt to changing conditions, and refine your approach based on performance.


Join our community of aspiring traders and take the first step towards financial independence through forex trading. Our engaging content, supportive community, and comprehensive resources will guide you every step of the way. Enroll today and start your journey towards mastering forex trading!
targetAudiences: Beginner Traders: Individuals who are new to forex trading and have little to no experience in the financial markets. This group seeks to gain foundational knowledge about currency trading, understand basic concepts, and develop the skills necessary to start trading confidently

Aspiring Investors: Individuals looking to diversify their investment portfolios by including forex trading. This group may have some experience with other investment vehicles (like stocks or mutual funds) and is interested in learning about the unique aspects of forex trading, including risk management and technical analysis

Intermediate Traders: Those who have basic knowledge of forex trading and have engaged in some trading but wish to enhance their skills and strategies. This group seeks to deepen their understanding of technical and fundamental analysis, refine their trading strategies, and improve their overall trading performance through advanced techniques and psychological insights

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT e IA: Corso completo sull'IA generativa
courseDetails.shortDescription: Padroneggia l'IA: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - guida completa sull'intelligenza artificiale e le IA generative.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Formazione Completa su ChatGPT e IA Generative:

Siete pronti a iniziare ogni giornata con un alleato, un assistente personale estremamente abile, capace di svolgere i vostri compiti con una precisione e una rapidità senza pari?

Un'IA capace di scrivere email, articoli o rapporti, di creare immagini ispiratrici, di analizzare dati complessi, di programmare soluzioni su misura e di risolvere una moltitudine di problemi, permettendovi così di concentrarvi su ciò che conta davvero.

Per ottenere tutti questi benefici dall'IA, è necessario padroneggiarla. Molte persone si entusiasmano, provano 2 o 3 prompt e finiscono per abbandonare il tema senza scoprire il vero potenziale dell'intelligenza artificiale. Questo comportamento spesso è dovuto a una mancanza di conoscenza delle tecniche, dei metodi e delle configurazioni che permettono di ottenere i migliori risultati con l'IA.

L'obiettivo di questa formazione è quindi di fornirvi tutte le chiavi per comunicare efficacemente con l'IA, configurarla al meglio e sfruttarla appieno.

Per raggiungere questo scopo, ho progettato un percorso conciso e dinamico che vi permetterà di sviluppare le conoscenze e le competenze essenziali per l'utilizzo ottimizzato dell'IA.


Durante questa formazione, vedremo insieme:

  • Come formulare richieste chiare all'IA per ottenere le migliori risposte possibili.

  • Come configurare ChatGPT affinché diventi il vostro professore, co-fondatore o analista di fiducia.

  • Come generare molteplici idee e migliorare nel vostro lavoro, diventando più produttivi, più veloci, più pertinenti ed efficienti.

  • Come sfruttare appieno la multimodalità di ChatGPT per scrivergli, parlargli, ascoltarlo, trasmettergli immagini e chiedergli di interpretarle.

  • Come spingere Dall-e o Copilot a generare le migliori immagini possibili.

  • Come trovare alternative interessanti alla versione a pagamento di ChatGPT.

  • Esploreremo anche altre IA come Copilot, Claude o Gemini.

  • Vedremo come adattare ChatGPT alle vostre preferenze e bisogni specifici per risposte su misura.

  • Vedremo come potenziare ChatGPT grazie ai GPT: come utilizzare queste applicazioni e persino come crearle senza essere sviluppatori.

  • Esploreremo anche argomenti più tecnici alla fine della formazione, come la gestione delle API, il playground, l'integrazione di ChatGPT su altri software come Excel o Google Sheets, per esempio.

  • E soprattutto vedremo che tutto questo è accessibile a tutti, anche ai principianti.


In questa formazione troverete:

  • Dimostrazioni concrete.

  • Schede tecniche e guide pratiche scaricabili.

[Aggiornamento: Ho aggiunto video sull'uso del modello GPT4o, successore della versione GPT4]

In breve, vi apprestate a seguire un corso chiaro, accessibile e coinvolgente. Abbastanza dettagliato da coprire i concetti essenziali senza essere troppo lungo. Indipendentemente dal vostro livello di partenza, che siate principianti o alla ricerca di tecniche avanzate, questa è l'unica formazione di cui avrete bisogno per padroneggiare ChatGPT.


La mia presentazione:

Mi chiamo Yassine Rochd, sono il fondatore di un ente di formazione che ha aiutato migliaia di studenti a raggiungere i loro obiettivi professionali.

Sono anche appassionato di tecnologia. Dopo una laurea magistrale in finanza e esperienze nella consulenza e nei fondi di investimento, ho seguito una formazione in sviluppo web e trascorso centinaia di ore a scoprire e utilizzare le IA.

Oggi desidero trasmettervi nel modo più chiaro possibile ciò che ho imparato in questi anni.


Certificazione e garanzia:

Completando questa formazione, riceverete una certificazione che potrete anche condividere su LinkedIn. Questa formazione è inoltre senza rischi, grazie alla garanzia "soddisfatti o rimborsati" di 30 giorni. Avrete accesso a vita alla formazione, alle risorse scaricabili e ai futuri aggiornamenti. Siete a un clic di distanza dal padroneggiare una tecnologia estremamente utile che vi renderà più efficienti, più produttivi e semplicemente indispensabili.


Dettaglio delle diverse sezioni di questo corso:

Introduzione rapida a ChatGPT
Scoprite come padroneggiare rapidamente ChatGPT con poche video lezioni. Esplorate l'interfaccia intuitiva di ChatGPT e imparate a creare i vostri primi prompt per sfruttare appieno la potenza dell'IA. Che si tratti di generare tabelle, fare brainstorming, creare idee, tradurre e correggere testi o redigere vari contenuti, diventerete più veloci e performanti con l'IA. Scoprite come ChatGPT può assistervi nella ricerca di lavoro e adattarsi alle vostre esigenze professionali per aumentare la vostra efficienza. Vedrete che ChatGPT è capace di creare una varietà di contenuti, dalle email e lettere agli articoli e post per i social media, senza dimenticare la scrittura di codice informatico.

Le basi del prompt engineering
Imparate perché il prompt engineering è essenziale e come può trasformare ChatGPT in un vero esperto. Capite l'importanza del contesto e degli obiettivi per strutturare le vostre interazioni e scoprite come regolare il formato e la temperatura per ottimizzare i vostri prompt e variare il livello di creatività del modello. Personalizzate le vostre interazioni padroneggiando il tono e lo stile, e beneficiate di cinque consigli pratici per ottenere risposte ancora più pertinenti da ChatGPT.

Tecniche avanzate di prompt engineering
In questa sezione, vedremo come creare prompt che generano altri prompt. Studieremo il metodo del reverse engineering, le funzionalità di ricerca web, l'interpretazione delle immagini e molte altre tecniche avanzate.

Dall-e
Passeremo alla generazione di immagini con Dall-e. Vedrete come passare da un risultato mediocre a opere estetiche e ispiratrici, come modificare semplicemente e rapidamente porzioni di immagini e ottimizzare i vostri risultati. Studieremo anche tecniche avanzate che vi permetteranno, per esempio, di creare una continuità nella generazione di un personaggio di finzione o di fumetti, per risultati ancora più impressionanti.

Le soluzioni ai limiti di ChatGPT e dell'IA
ChatGPT e altri modelli di intelligenza artificiale presentano dei limiti e delle debolezze. Vedremo in questa sezione quali sono e come superarle.

Funzionalità interessanti di ChatGPT
Imparate a configurare le funzionalità di condivisione delle vostre conversazioni per un utilizzo collaborativo di ChatGPT. Sfruttate al meglio l'applicazione mobile ChatGPT, esplorando tutte le opzioni che offre. Infine, scoprite i metodi per creare un contenuto unico con l'IA evitando qualsiasi forma di plagio o contenuto duplicato.

Copilot e Bing
Copilot propone diverse alternative interessanti a funzionalità avanzate e a pagamento di ChatGPT. Vedremo come sfruttare la collaborazione tra Microsoft e OpenAI per accedere a funzionalità avanzate di intelligenza artificiale integrate nel motore di ricerca Bing.

Gemini, Claude, Mistral e altri
Nella continuità della sezione precedente, studieremo altre IA come Gemini di Google o Claude di Anthropic. Vedremo i loro punti di forza e di debolezza, e studieremo diversi casi d'uso per sapere quando preferirle a ChatGPT.

Istruzioni personalizzate di ChatGPT
Adattate ChatGPT alle vostre esigenze e aspettative. Imparate a personalizzare le vostre interazioni configurando le vostre istruzioni personalizzate. Scoprite anche i punti di attenzione da considerare per un utilizzo ottimale.

I GPT
Scoprite il funzionamento dei GPT, queste mini applicazioni iperspecializzate che a volte possono superare ChatGPT. Imparate a creare il vostro GPT passo dopo passo. Padroneggiate le chiamate API per massimizzare le capacità di ChatGPT e scoprite alla fine della sezione come monetizzare i vostri GPT e, più in generale, come guadagnare denaro grazie a ChatGPT.

Gestione delle API e Playground
Esplorate il playground di ChatGPT e scoprite le nuove funzionalità che offre. Imparate a chiamare l'API di ChatGPT con livelli di difficoltà crescenti. Potrete così utilizzare ChatGPT al di fuori dell'interfaccia, creare un chatbot su un altro sito o anche integrare ChatGPT in altri software come Google Sheets o Excel, per esempio.
targetAudiences: Chiunque desideri padroneggiare l'IA e ChatGPT. Questa formazione è per tutti i livelli.

courseDetails.title: Personal Finance #11-Stock Investment -Equity Investments
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlocking Financial Success: Mastering Stocks, Equities, and Mutual Funds
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to this comprehensive course designed to empower you with the knowledge and skills required to navigate the intricate world of investing in stocks, equities, and mutual funds.

Understanding the Stock Market:

Our journey begins with a deep dive into the stock market. You'll gain a profound understanding of both primary and secondary markets, learning how stocks are bought and sold. Explore the fascinating inner workings of various stock exchanges, from their trading hours to their unique characteristics. Gain insight into the psychology of market participants and how market sentiment influences stock prices.

Mastering Stock Investing:

In this section, we demystify stock investing. Discover what it means to own a share in a company and learn the intricacies of trading stocks. We'll guide you through the process of selling your stock holdings and provide valuable insights into different stock categories, including income, value, and growth stocks. You'll also become well-versed in handling commissions and fees effectively.

Exploring Investment Vehicles:

Dive into the diverse array of investment options available. Navigate the world of individual stocks, exchange-traded funds (ETFs), and mutual funds. By understanding the unique features of each choice, you'll be equipped to make investment decisions aligned with your financial objectives. Explore how ETFs and mutual funds are structured, how they are traded, and their advantages and disadvantages.

Mastering Stock Fundamentals:

Develop the skills to analyze a company's financial health confidently. We'll explore both quantitative and qualitative methods for assessing a company's performance. Gain insights into stock sectors and learn how to interpret financial statements with precision. Learn how to conduct comprehensive fundamental analysis, including evaluating a company's income statement, balance sheet, and cash flow statement.

Analyzing Stocks Like a Pro:

Equip yourself with the tools used by seasoned investors. Unlock the potential of technical analysis and learn how to apply it to your investment strategies. Delve into the implications of corporate actions, such as stock splits and reverse stock splits, to make informed decisions. Learn how to use stock charts, technical indicators, and chart patterns to identify potential investment opportunities.

Understanding Preferred Stocks:

Venture into the world of preferred stocks. Discover various types, including cumulative, callable, and convertible preferred stocks. Gain insights into perpetual and adjustable-rate preferred stocks, broadening your investment horizons. Explore how preferred stocks differ from common stocks and bonds, and how to evaluate their suitability for your portfolio.

Performance Evaluation and Risk Management:

Learn to navigate stock valuation complexities. Master the art of calculating key metrics like Price-to-Earnings (P/E) ratios, Price/Earnings-to-Growth (PEG) ratios, and Beta. Dive deep into the Dividend Discount Model (DDM) to assess stock values accurately. Understand how to assess the risk associated with individual stocks and build a diversified portfolio to manage risk effectively.

Strategies for Savvy Investing:

Explore essential investment strategies like dollar-cost averaging and value averaging. Dive into Dividend Reinvestment Plans (DRIPs) and gain an in-depth understanding of buying on margin and short selling to make well-informed investment decisions. Learn about different investment styles, including value investing, growth investing, and income investing, and how to apply them to your portfolio.

Global Investment Perspectives:

Expand your investment horizons globally. Dive into the International Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM) and discover how to estimate dividend income effectively in a global context. Understand the factors that influence international stock markets and how to assess opportunities and risks when investing internationally.

Calculating Returns with Precision:

Unlock the secrets of investment returns. Learn how to calculate dividends, earnings per share (EPS), and the price-earnings ratio (P/E ratio) with precision. Explore various methods for projecting future returns with confidence. Understand the concept of total return and how it can impact your investment decisions.

Join Us on a Journey to Financial Prosperity:

This comprehensive course caters to both beginners and those with prior investment knowledge. Whether you aspire to build wealth, seek to grasp the intricacies of financial markets, or enhance your investment skills, this course is your gateway to success.

courseDetails.title: Modelización financiera: curso completo de finanzas en Excel
courseDetails.shortDescription: Caso práctico de modelización financiera en Excel – Business Plan, valoración y modelización financiera
courseDetails.longDescription:
Si está interesado en carreras financieras como Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, controlling o gestión financiera, es posible que ya se haya dado cuenta de que existe una habilidad clave que es esencial para cada uno de estos trabajos. Se trata de la modelización financiera.

Ya sea esté elaborando un Business Plan, evaluando una oportunidad de inversión, creando un informe financiero o realizando la valoración de una empresa, la modelización financiera le será una habilidad esencial.

Este curso completo de modelización financiera en Excel le brindará los conocimientos, códigos y mejores prácticas necesarios para crear un modelo Excel claro y bien estructurado que cumpla con las expectativas de los bancos de inversión, los fondos de Private Equity y los equipos de gestión financiera.

En esta formación, usted aprenderá las normas y reglas de la modelización financiera que se deben seguir para obtener resultados profesionales.

Aprenderá a diseñar un modelo financiero completo con múltiples escenarios de inversión, un calendario de deuda con diferentes tramos de financiamiento y características variables, una tabla clara de Fuentes y Usos, un Plan de Negocio profesional y un modelo de valoración de la empresa basado en transacciones comparables utilizando un EBITDA normativo. Por último, calcularemos la TIR y realizaremos un análisis de sensibilidad en función de los parámetros de salida de la inversión.

Por supuesto, si aún no está familiarizado con todos estos conceptos, repasaremos su significado antes de comenzar con la modelización financiera en Excel.

Para concluir, este curso cubre fundamentos esenciales en finanzas que es necesario dominar si está interesado en el control financiero, el análisis financiero o carreras transaccionales (Private Equity, M&A, Transaction Services).
targetAudiences: Estudiantes de finanzas interesados en áreas altamente competitivas como Private Equity, Venture Capital, M&A, Leveraged Finance, ECM, Transaction Services, Restructuring, Valoración y, por supuesto, modelización financiera

Che stiate elaborando un business plan, un report finanziario, o conducendo una valutazione aziendale, questa competenza è indispensabile.

Questo corso completo sulla modellazione finanziaria in Excel vi doterà delle conoscenze, delle tecniche e delle migliori pratiche per sviluppare un modello su Excel chiaro e ben organizzato che risponda alle aspettative di banche d'investimento, fondi di Private Equity e squadre di gestione finanziaria.

Imparerete a creare un modello finanziario dettagliato con vari scenari di investimento, un piano di indebitamento con diverse tranche di finanziamento e caratteristiche variabili, una chiara tabella di Fonti e Impieghi, un Business Plan professionale e un modello di valutazione aziendale basato su transazioni comparabili, impiegando un EBITDA normativo. Infine, calcoleremo il Tasso Interno di Ritorno (TIR) e lo adegueremo in base ai parametri di uscita dell'investimento.

Naturalmente, se non siete ancora a conoscenza di tutti questi concetti, ne chiariremo il significato prima di iniziare con la modellazione finanziaria su Excel.

Questo corso abbraccia i fondamenti essenziali della finanza, indispensabili da padroneggiare per chi è interessato al controllo finanziario, all'analisi finanziaria o alle carriere transazionali (PE, M&A, TS).

courseDetails.title: Cold Calling Guide: How to Be Confident While Cold Calling
courseDetails.shortDescription: Master Cold Calling Techniques to Boost Confidence, Build Rapport, and Close More Sales
courseDetails.longDescription:
Unlock the secrets to successful cold calling and transform your sales game with our comprehensive course, "Cold Calling Guide: How to Be Confident While Cold Calling." Whether you're a seasoned sales professional looking to sharpen your skills, an aspiring entrepreneur eager to make connections, or a career changer aiming to break into the competitive world of sales, this course is designed to equip you with the skills and confidence you need to thrive in cold calling.


In today’s fast-paced business environment, the ability to initiate meaningful conversations with potential clients is more crucial than ever. Cold calling can often be viewed as daunting, but with the right techniques and mindset, it can become one of your most powerful tools for generating leads and closing deals. Throughout this course, you will discover proven strategies that empower you to overcome fear and anxiety, allowing you to approach each call with enthusiasm and assurance.


We begin by delving into the foundational principles of cold calling. You’ll learn the essential elements of crafting compelling scripts that not only grab attention but also engage prospects in meaningful dialogue. You'll understand the importance of personalizing your approach to cater to different audiences, ensuring your message resonates with their specific needs and pain points.


Effective questioning is at the heart of successful cold calling. In this course, you will master the art of crafting open-ended and probing questions that encourage prospects to share valuable insights about their challenges. By understanding their needs, you'll be better positioned to offer tailored solutions that demonstrate your value and increase the likelihood of conversion.


Another critical aspect of cold calling that we cover is recognizing and responding to buying signals. You’ll learn how to identify verbal and non-verbal cues that indicate a prospect's interest, enabling you to transition seamlessly into the closing phase. Armed with this knowledge, you’ll feel more confident in asking for a commitment and guiding the conversation toward a successful outcome.


Building rapport is essential in any sales interaction, and this course will teach you how to establish instant connections with prospects. You’ll explore techniques for finding common ground, using active listening skills, and responding with empathy. These interpersonal skills will not only enhance your ability to engage with clients but also foster trust, making prospects more receptive to your offerings.


Rejection is an inevitable part of the cold calling process, but it doesn’t have to derail your confidence. You’ll learn effective strategies for accepting rejection, reframing it as a learning opportunity, and developing resilience that keeps you motivated. Our course emphasizes the importance of a growth mindset, encouraging you to view each call as a chance for improvement and growth, regardless of the outcome.


As part of your learning journey, you will engage in practical exercises, including role-playing scenarios that simulate real-life interactions. This hands-on approach will allow you to practice your skills in a safe environment, gaining valuable experience that translates to real-world success.


By the end of this course, you will emerge as a confident cold caller, equipped with the knowledge and skills to initiate conversations, handle objections gracefully, and convert leads into loyal customers. You'll join a community of like-minded learners who share your commitment to personal and professional growth, providing networking opportunities that extend beyond the course.


Don't let fear hold you back from achieving your sales goals. Invest in your future success today and take the first step toward mastering the art of cold calling. Enroll now and start your journey to becoming a confident, successful cold caller, ready to make an impact in the world of sales!

courseDetails.title: ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka: kapsamlı yapay zeka eğitimi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Yapay Zekayı Öğrenin: ChatGPT, Dall-e, Claude, Gemini - yapay zeka hakkında kapsamlı rehber
courseDetails.longDescription:
ChatGPT ve Yapay Zeka Eğitimi:

Her güne, görevlerinizi benzersiz bir hız ve hassasiyetle yerine getirebilecek son derece yetenekli bir kişisel asistanla başlamak ister misiniz? E-postalarınızı, makalelerinizi veya raporlarınızı yazabilen, ilham verici görseller üretebilen, karmaşık verileri analiz edebilen, özel çözümler kodlayabilen ve çeşitli sorunları çözebilen bir yapay zeka ile çalışarak, gerçekten önemli olan konulara odaklanabilirsiniz.

Ancak, bu avantajlardan tam anlamıyla yararlanabilmek için yapay zekayı derinlemesine anlamak önemlidir. Pek çok kişi birkaç komut verip, yapay zekanın gerçek potansiyelini keşfetmeden süreci yarıda bırakıyor. Bunun arkasında genellikle, yapay zekadan en iyi sonuçları almanızı sağlayacak teknikler, yöntemler ve ince ayarlar hakkında bilgi eksikliği bulunur.

Bu eğitimin amacı, yapay zeka ile etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabilmeniz, onu en iyi şekilde yapılandırmanız ve tam potansiyelinden faydalanmanız için size gerekli tüm araçları sunmaktır.

Bu hedefe ulaşmak için, yapay zekayı optimize ederek kullanmanız gereken temel bilgi ve becerileri kazanmanızı sağlayacak kapsamlı ve dinamik bir eğitim hazırladım.

Bu eğitim süresince birlikte şunları öğreneceğiz:

  • En iyi sonuçları almak için yapay zekaya nasıl net sorular sorulur.

  • ChatGPT'yi güvenilir öğretmeniniz, iş ortağınız veya analiz uzmanınız haline getirecek şekilde nasıl yapılandırılır.

  • Çalışmalarınızda daha üretken, hızlı, anlamlı ve etkili olmak için nasıl çeşitli fikirler üretebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin çok yönlü kullanımından tam olarak faydalanmak için ona nasıl yazılır, nasıl konuşulur, nasıl dinlenir, ona görseller nasıl gönderilir ve nasıl yorumlanması istenir.

  • Dall-e veya Copilot'u en iyi görselleri üretmeleri için nasıl yönlendirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'nin ücretli sürümüne alternatif olarak hangi ilginç seçenekleri değerlendirebilirsiniz.

  • Copilot, Claude veya Gemini gibi diğer yapay zeka araçlarını da keşfedeceğiz.

  • ChatGPT'yi özel ihtiyaçlarınıza ve tercihinize göre nasıl özelleştirebilirsiniz.

  • ChatGPT'yi GPT’lerle nasıl güçlendirebileceğimizi göreceğiz: Bu uygulamaları nasıl kullanacağınızı ve hatta geliştirici olmadan nasıl oluşturabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.

  • Eğitimin sonunda, API yönetimi, Playground, ChatGPT’nin Excel veya Google Sheets gibi yazılımlara entegrasyonu gibi daha teknik konuları da ele alacağız.

  • Ve en önemlisi, tüm bunların başlangıç seviyesindeki kişiler için bile erişilebilir olduğunu göreceğiz.

Bu eğitimde şunları bulacaksınız:

  • Pratik ve somut gösterimler.

  • İndirilebilir teknik bilgiler ve pratik kılavuzlar.

[Güncelleme: GPT-4'ün yerini alan GPT-4o modelinin kullanımına dair videolar ekledim]

Kısacası, açık, erişilebilir ve ilgi çekici bir kursa başlamak üzeresiniz. Gerekli kavramları detaylı bir şekilde ele alan, ancak gereksiz uzunluğa kaçmayan bu eğitim, ChatGPT'yi tam anlamıyla öğrenmeniz için ihtiyacınız olan tek kaynak olacak. Başlangıç seviyeniz ne olursa olsun, ister yeni başlıyor olun ister ileri düzey teknikler arıyor olun, bu kurs size hitap edecek.


Tanıtımım:

Adım Yassine Rochd, binlerce öğrencinin profesyonel hedeflerine ulaşmasına yardımcı olan bir eğitim kuruluşunun kurucusuyum.

Teknolojiye büyük bir tutku duyuyorum. Finans alanında yüksek lisans yaptıktan ve danışmanlık ile yatırım fonları alanında deneyim kazandıktan sonra, web geliştirme konusunda eğitim aldım ve yüzlerce saatimi yapay zekayı keşfetmeye ve kullanmaya adadım.

Bugün, son birkaç yılda öğrendiklerimi size en anlaşılır şekilde aktarmayı hedefliyorum.


Sertifikasyon ve Garanti:

  • Bu eğitimi tamamladığınızda, LinkedIn'de bile paylaşabileceğiniz bir sertifika alacaksınız.

  • Eğitimimiz risksizdir; çünkü 30 günlük "memnuniyet garantisi" sunuyoruz.

  • Ayrıca, eğitime ve indirilebilir kaynaklara ömür boyu erişim hakkınız olacak.

Sizi daha etkili, daha üretken ve vazgeçilmez kılacak bu son derece faydalı teknolojiyi öğrenmek için sadece bir tık uzaktasınız.


Kursun Bölüm Detayları:

ChatGPT'ye Hızlı Başlangıç:

ChatGPT'yi yalnızca birkaç video ile hızla öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin sezgisel arayüzüne adım atın ve yapay zekanın gücünü tam anlamıyla kullanabilmek için ilk komutlarınızı nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. Tablo oluşturmadan beyin fırtınasına, fikir üretmeden metin çevirisi ve düzeltmeye kadar çeşitli içerikler oluşturmak için ChatGPT ile daha hızlı ve verimli olacaksınız. ChatGPT'nin iş arayışınızda size nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini ve profesyonel ihtiyaçlarınıza uyum sağlayarak verimliliğinizi nasıl artırabileceğini keşfedin. ChatGPT'nin e-postalar ve mektuplardan makalelere ve sosyal medya paylaşımlarına, hatta yazılım kodlamasına kadar birçok içerik oluşturma yeteneğine sahip olduğunu göreceksiniz.


Prompt Engineering'in Temelleri

Prompt engineering'in önemini ve ChatGPT'yi gerçek bir uzmana dönüştürme yöntemlerini keşfedin. Etkileşimlerinizi yapılandırmak için bağlamın ve hedeflerin rolünü anlayın; en iyi sonuçları elde etmek için format ve sıcaklık ayarlarını nasıl optimize edeceğinizi öğrenin. Ton ve stil kontrolü ile etkileşimlerinizi kişiselleştirin ve ChatGPT'den daha alakalı yanıtlar alabilmeniz için 5 pratik ipucunu uygulayın.


İleri Düzey Prompt Engineering Teknikleri

Bu bölümde, kendi kendine yeni promptlar üretebilen promptlar oluşturmayı öğreneceğiz. Reverse engineering (tersine mühendislik), web arama işlevleri, görüntü yorumlama teknikleri ve diğer birçok ileri düzey tekniği derinlemesine inceleyeceğiz.


Dall-e

Dall-e ile görsel oluşturma sürecine adım atacağız. Orta düzeydeki bir sonuçtan estetik ve ilham verici eserlere nasıl geçiş yapabileceğinizi, görüntülerin belirli bölümlerini basit ve hızlı bir şekilde nasıl değiştirebileceğinizi ve sonuçlarınızı nasıl optimize edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz. Ayrıca, bir çizgi roman ya da kurgusal karakterin sürekliliğini yaratmanıza olanak tanıyan ileri düzey teknikleri inceleyerek daha etkileyici sonuçlar elde edebileceksiniz.


ChatGPT ve Yapay Zekanın Sınırlarına Çözümler

ChatGPT ve diğer yapay zeka modellerinin belirli sınırlamaları ve zayıflıkları vardır. Bu bölümde, bu sınırlamaların neler olduğunu ve bunları nasıl aşabileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


ChatGPT'deki İlginç Özellikler

ChatGPT'yi işbirlikçi bir şekilde kullanabilmek için sohbetlerinizi paylaşma özelliklerini nasıl yapılandıracağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT mobil uygulamasını en iyi şekilde kullanmak için sunduğu tüm seçenekleri keşfedin. Son olarak, yapay zeka ile benzersiz içerikler oluşturmanın ve her türlü intihal veya kopya içerikten kaçınmanın yollarını öğreneceksiniz.


Copilot ve Bing

Copilot, ChatGPT'nin ücretli ve gelişmiş özelliklerine birkaç ilginç alternatif sunar. Microsoft ve OpenAI iş birliği sayesinde, Bing arama motoruna entegre edilmiş ileri düzey yapay zeka özelliklerine nasıl erişebileceğinizi inceleyeceğiz.


Gemini, Claude, Mistral ve Diğerleri

Bir önceki bölümün devamı olarak, Google'ın Gemini'si veya Anthropic'in Claude'u gibi diğer yapay zeka modellerini inceleyeceğiz. Bu modellerin güçlü ve zayıf yönlerini değerlendirerek, hangi durumlarda ChatGPT yerine tercih edilebileceklerini göreceğiz.


ChatGPT Özel Talimatları (Custom Instructions)

ChatGPT'yi ihtiyaçlarınıza ve beklentilerinize göre nasıl özelleştireceğinizi öğrenin. Özel talimatlarınızı yapılandırarak etkileşimlerinizi nasıl kişiselleştirebileceğinizi keşfedin ve optimum kullanım için göz önünde bulundurmanız gereken önemli noktaları öğrenin.


GPT'ler

Bazı durumlarda ChatGPT'yi bile geride bırakabilen, son derece uzmanlaşmış mini uygulamalar olan GPT'lerin nasıl çalıştığını keşfedin. Kendi GPT'nizi adım adım nasıl oluşturacağınızı öğrenin. ChatGPT'nin yeteneklerini en üst düzeye çıkarmak için API çağrılarını nasıl yöneteceğinizi öğrenecek ve bölümün sonunda GPT'lerinizi nasıl paraya çevirebileceğinizi ve genel olarak ChatGPT ile nasıl gelir elde edebileceğinizi keşfedeceksiniz.


API Yönetimi ve Playground

ChatGPT'nin Playground'unu keşfedin ve sunduğu yeni özellikleri öğrenin. Artan zorluk seviyelerinde ChatGPT API'sine nasıl çağrı yapacağınızı öğrenin. Böylece ChatGPT'yi arayüz dışında kullanabilir, başka bir siteye chatbot yerleştirebilir veya ChatGPT'yi Google Sheets veya Excel gibi diğer yazılımlara entegre edebilirsiniz.
targetAudiences: Yapay zeka ve ChatGPT'yi öğrenmek isteyen herkes için, seviyeniz ne olursa olsun.

courseDetails.title: Financial Accounting: A Comprehensive Guide with E-book
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlock Financial Accounting Mastery: Comprehensive Course for Students, Professionals, and Business Owners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Get ready for a deep dive into Financial Accounting, a critical skill for any aspiring accountant, business owner, or student. This comprehensive course offers you lifetime access to many sections of engaging video content, a multitude of real-world examples, practice problems, and an extensive, downloadable e-book in EPUB, MOBI, and PDF formats.

From the fundamentals of the double-entry accounting system to the complexities of long-term liabilities and cash flow statements, this course covers a breadth of topics equivalent to an undergraduate Financial Accounting program. The course supplements academic study by providing an online resource you can refer back to, ensuring the concepts stay fresh and readily accessible.

We begin with an introduction to Financial Accounting and progress steadily through various topics, including recording transactions, adjusting and closing entries, merchandising transactions, and various cost flow assumptions. Specialized sections delve into subsidiary ledgers, bank reconciliations, depreciation methods, payroll accounting, and more.

The course incorporates Excel for practical application of the theories taught. If you're unfamiliar with Excel, fear not! We provide pre-formatted worksheets and step-by-step instructional videos that move at a friendly pace.

We debunk the myths surrounding debits and credits, illustrate how to record transactions using these methods, and demonstrate the importance of period-end adjusting entries.

This course is more than just a procedural guide—it stresses the understanding of underlying theories to make learners flexible and adaptable in a constantly changing environment. You'll learn the rationale behind financial accounting processes, ensuring you can apply these skills in a variety of contexts.

Incorporating real-world scenarios, each section breaks down complex concepts into understandable chunks, followed by practical application in Excel.

Topics include, but are not limited to:

· Debits and Credits

· Period End Adjusting Entries

· Recording Closing Entries

· Inventory Transactions

· Subsidiary Ledgers & Special Journals

· Bank Reconciliations

· Accounts Receivable

· Depreciation Methods

· Payroll Accounting

· Partnership Accounting

· Corporate Accounting

· Bonds Payable, Notes Payable, & Long-Term Liabilities

· Cash Flow Statements

The course is designed to start at the basics and gradually advance to the level of detail expected in an undergraduate program. By course completion, you will have a firm grasp on Financial Accounting that not only stands the test of time but also serves as a continuously available resource in your accounting journey. Enroll now to become a confident, adaptable accounting professional.
targetAudiences: Accounting Students: This course serves as an excellent supplement to formal accounting education, providing a practical understanding of financial accounting concepts and their application in real-world scenarios.

Professionals Transitioning to Accounting Roles: If you are considering a career change into an accounting field or seeking to enhance your accounting knowledge and skills, this course will provide a solid foundation.

Small Business Owners and Entrepreneurs: Understanding financial accounting is essential for effectively managing business finances. This course will equip you with the knowledge to interpret financial statements, record transactions accurately, and make informed financial decisions.

Finance and Business Professionals: Professionals working in finance, business, or related fields who want to expand their understanding of financial accounting principles and practices will benefit from this course.

Self-learners and Lifelong Learners: If you have a genuine interest in learning financial accounting, whether for personal enrichment or curiosity, this course provides a comprehensive and structured learning experience.

Bookkeepers and Accountants: Bookkeepers who want to enhance their knowledge of financial accounting principles or accountants looking to refresh their skills will find this course valuable for professional development.

Individuals Preparing for Professional Certification Exams: If you are studying for professional accounting certifications, such as the CPA (Certified Public Accountant) exam, this course can serve as a supplementary resource to reinforce and deepen your understanding of financial accounting concepts.

Anyone Interested in Understanding Business Finances: Financial literacy is crucial for personal and professional success. This course will demystify financial accounting, empowering individuals to make informed financial decisions in their personal and professional lives.
